name: Bestial Spirit
HP: 20 (air and fire only) or 30 (rock and water only) + 5 times the power level

traits.name: Flyby (Air Only)
traits.description: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Pack Tactics (Fire and Rock Only)
traits.description: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
traits.description: The beast can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half the power level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the power level piercing damage (+1d4 fire damage for Fire).
